project.description:
This suite will execute automated test cases from TCMS
The default arguments are set to dedicated hardware intended for continuous nightly test runs.

To View Results, click TestNG Report

MANUAL INSTRUCTIONS:

  • Click 'Build Now' to manually begin a test run.
  • From the list of fields, read their descriptions and set the values appropriate for your testing.
  • Then click the 'Build' button.

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: TEST_SCRIPT
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: testNG XML file containing the test script one wishes to execute

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SERVER_HOSTNAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: hostname of a functional Candlepin server

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SERVER_PORT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
port through which to access Candlepin server
usually 8443 for an On Premises (stand-alone) Candlepin server

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: SERVER_ON_PREMISES
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: set to true if your Candlepin server is an On Premises (stand-alone) server

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SERVER_INSTALLDIR
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
directory where your On Premises Candlepin server is installed and running on your SERVER_HOSTNAME
This is used to git the latest tagged code from the git repository and deploy it.
Setting this value will update your On Premises Candlepin server updated to the most recent git tag.
This parameter is ignored when SERVER_ON_PREMISES is false.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CLIENT1_HOSTNAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: hostname of the primary client on which the subscription-manager rpm will be installed and the subscription-manager-cli will be tested

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CLIENT1_USERNAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: primary username used to register to the Candlepin server

hudson.model.PasswordParameterDefinition.name: CLIENT1_PASSWORD
hudson.model.PasswordParameterDefinition.description: password of the primary username used to register to the Candlepin server

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CLIENT2_HOSTNAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
hostname of the secondary client on which the subscription-manager rpm will be installed and the subscription-manager-cli will be tested
NOTE: Specifying CLIENT2_* values will invoke multi-client testing. To skip multi-client tests, do NOT set a value for this parameter.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CLIENT2_USERNAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
secondary username used to register to the Candlepin server
CLIENT2_USERNAME must belong to the same account as CLIENT1_USERNAME.
NOTE: Specifying CLIENT2_* values will invoke multi-client testing. To skip multi-client tests, do NOT set a value for this parameter.

hudson.model.PasswordParameterDefinition.name: CLIENT2_PASSWORD
hudson.model.PasswordParameterDefinition.description:
password of the secondary username used to register to the Candlepin server
NOTE: Specifying CLIENT2_* values will invoke multi-client testing. To skip multi-client tests, do NOT set a value for this parameter.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CLIENT_REPOFORDEPENDENCIES
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: repo label that you have already configured on your client hostname from which dependencies will be resolved and installed from during the install of the subscription-manager rpm

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CLIENT_CERTFREQUENCY
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: default certificate refresh frequency as set in /etc/rhsm/rhsm.conf (you can usually leave this one alone)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: RPM_URL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
URL to the latest subscription-manager RPM that will be installed and tested on the client(s)
For example: http://download.devel.redhat.com/brewroot/packages/subscription-manager/0.72/1.el6/i686/subscription-manager-0.72-1.el6.i686.rpm

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PRODCERT_URL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: URL to a product cert (supplied by the developers who are defining what product certs currently look like)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PRODCERT_PRODUCT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Product which corresponds to the product cert located at the supplied PRODCERT URL

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SERVER_BASEURL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: base URL to Candlepin server as set in /etc/rhsm/rhsm.conf (you can usually leave this one alone)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: USERNAME_TCUNACCEPTED
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: username corresponding to a user who has NOT accepted their Red Hat terms and conditions (only works in an IT environment, will be disregarded if running against an On Premises Candlepin server)

hudson.model.PasswordParameterDefinition.name: PASSWORD_TCUNACCEPTED
hudson.model.PasswordParameterDefinition.description: password corresponding to a user who has NOT accepted their Red Hat terms and conditions (only works in an IT environment, will be disregarded if running against an On Premises Candlepin server)

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash -xe
cd "$WORKSPACE" if [ -d automatjon ]; then cd automatjon git clean -dxf git pull else git clone git://git.rhndev.redhat.com/automatjon fi
cd "$WORKSPACE"
if [ -d webui-framework ]; then cd webui-framework git clean -dxf git pull else git clone git://github.com/weissjeffm/webui-framework.git fi
chmod 600 "$WORKSPACE"/automatjon/sm/.ssh/id*
